import React, {useState} from "react"; import 'react-dropzone-uploader/dist/styles.css' import Dropzone from 'react-dropzone-uploader'; export default function Contact() { const [name, setName] = useState() const [email, setEmail] = useState() const [phone, setPhone] = useState() const [description, setDescription] = useState() const [submitted, setSubmitted] = useState(false) const [location, setLocation] = useState() const [files, setFiles] = useState() const formFilled = name && email && phone && description && location const getUploadParams = ({ meta }) => { const url = 'https://httpbin.org/post' return { url, meta: { fileUrl: `${url}/${encodeURIComponent(meta.name)}` } } } const handleChangeStatus = ({ meta }, status) => { console.log(status, meta) } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // console.log(files.map(f => f.meta)) // allFiles.forEach(f => f.remove()) const data = new FormData(e.currentTarget); const templateParams = { firstName: data.get('firstName'), email: data.get('email'), phone: data.get('phone'), description: data.get('description'), location: data.get('location'), attachments: data.get('attachments') } console.log(e) // SendEmail(e) setSubmitted(true) } return (
Send A Message
Your message has been sent. Thank you!
setName(e.target.value)} className="form-control" id="name" placeholder="Your Name" data-rule="minlen:4" data-msg="Please enter at least 4 chars" />
setEmail(e.target.value)} className="form-control" name="email" id="email" placeholder="Your Email" data-rule="email" data-msg="Please enter a valid email" />
setPhone(e.target.value)} className="form-control" name="phone" id="phone" data-rule="required" placeholder="Phone Number" />
(extra.reject ? 'Image, audio and video files only' : 'Drag Files')} styles={{ dropzone: { minHeight: 200, maxHeight: 250 }, dropzoneReject: { borderColor: 'red', backgroundColor: '#DAA' }, inputLabel: (files, extra) => (extra.reject ? { color: 'red' } : {}), }} />
